QueryResult.text: SELECT R.RESOURCE_ID,R.FACT_DATE, MAX(S.SLICE) AVAILABLE_HOURS, SUM(R.ETC_QTY) ETC_HOURS, SUM(R.ACTUAL_QTY) ACTUAL_HOURS, SUM(R.BASE_QTY) BASE_HOURS, SUM(R.ALLOCATED_QTY) ALLOCATED_HOURS FROM NBI_PRT_FACTS R JOIN PRJ_BLB_SLICES S ON (R.FACT_DATE = S.SLICE_DATE and R.RESOURCE_ID = S.PRJ_OBJECT_ID ) JOIN PRJ_BLB_SLICEREQUESTS SR ON (S.SLICE_REQUEST_ID = SR.ID AND SR.REQUEST_NAME = 'DAILYRESOURCEAVAILCURVE') JOIN SRM_RESOURCES RES ON S.PRJ_OBJECT_ID = RES.ID WHERE RES.INCLUDE_FLAG=1 -- 1->Indicates a resource should be included in datamart extraction. GROUP BY R.RESOURCE_ID,R.FACT_DATE
